jd: Hi, Greetings from SourceMantra, Please have a look at the below opportunity and reply to me if you are interested. Job: Senior .Net DeveloperLocation : Irving TX – Onsite – Need LocalsDuration: Long Term Contract 10+ Years and passport Number is must for Submission. Job Description:Technical Skills:8+ years of experience in .Net development (C#, (link unavailable), Web API).Strong knowledge of .Net Framework (.Net Core, .Net 5+), Entity Framework, and design patterns.Experience with database management (Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle).Familiarity with Agile development methodologies (Scrum/Kanban).Version control systems (Git/TFS).Retail industry experience (point-of-sale, inventory management, e-commerce). Soft Skills:Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.Strong communication and collaboration skills.Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.Proactive and results-driven mindset. Nice to Have:Microsoft certifications (MCP, MCSD, etc.).Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).Familiarity with DevOps tools (Jenkins, TeamCity, Azure DevOps).Knowledge of cloud platforms (Azure, AWS).Experience with front-end technologies (JavaScript, Angular, React).
